attributes.action: take the country to the polls in a vote of no confidence in Parliament as a whole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country should be given the chance to vote about the ability of the present Parliament to continue in power.  All MPs must be held to account about the current expenses scandal. They all knew that fraudulent behaviour was occurring but no-one said anything until the media started publishing expense reports.  Those that claim ignorance, especially party leaders, should have all privileges removed immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
